title: Unions Are on the Rise Again
itunes:title: Unions Are on the Rise Again
description:
Kate Andrias, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses why unions are on the rise in this country after being out of favor, and the legal struggles to form unions.

James Park, a professor at UCLA Law School, discusses how a former Nomura Holdings senior bond trader beat the SEC in a case over lying to his clients.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
